reviewText: If you expect to have a true, natural Asian experience, you might be disappointed. But if you are heading for this little spice of Asian blood mixed with some typical Playboy set-ups, then you are heading in the right direction. I would give it three stars instead of four if only the content was to be considered. This little fourth star is there to reflect the editing and mastering quality.

This is my first Playboy video, but I really liked it.  Some of the women were not great in this video.  And some of the segments were boring to watch, but seeing Sung Hi Lee getting off and Lisa Marie Scott dancing are two reasons to buy this video.

This is the first Playboy video I have ever seen, but it was worth the price of admission.  Some of the scenes were too fast or boring due to the stories.  The paradise scene with Sung Hi Lee was very steamy.  Lisa Marie Scott and Lynn Thomas were very sexy.  I definitely recommend this video.

In comparison to other VHS/DVD products that I bought, this DVD is typical Playboy fare, with various women filmed in a variety of environments.  In fact, this video is a compilation of segments taken from other Playboy movies over a course of about a decade (maybe longer).  Still, this is a pretty good DVD that will satisfy the tastes of anyone who loves beautiful women.  However, for those who are looking for a video that consists entirely of women who are pure Asian (and not mixed (hapas)), could be disappointed.
The reason I gave it four stars instead of three was because of the soundtrack, which I thought was pretty good.  In particular, I like the music used in the first half of chapter 8 (Body in Motion), which is a rock/country music hybrid that accentuated the scene featuring Lisa Marie Scott.  Too bad that the soundtrack isn't sold seperately.
BTW, if you want to buy this DVD, you can do it at ....

If you simply want an eyefull of the most increadably beautiful women in  the world then this is for you! For those who have a taste for asian  beauty, don't pass this up. A dozen sequences set to soothing music, each  with a gorgeous lady straight out of an exotic dreamland. From tranquill  gardens to industrial power there are settings to appeal to all tastes.  There are no goofy plots or odd story story lines to distract from this  collection of female perfection. Try it, you'll like it! This review is for  the DVD version.

The women are gorgeous, but the stories are too tame. I would still buy the tape even if I had seen it first. Two scenes that I really liked weren't too tame but weren't outlandishly wild either. The were very  erotic. The tape is worth the price. I would recomend buying this tape if  you like "R" rated movies with a lot of nudity. If you are the  Asian women fan I would highly recomend the video.
I bought the VHS version and the girls are wonderful, if you like japanese, korean and chinese women buy it! It is very hard to find a video of asian girls and I'd like to see more video like this.
